function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Studies related to the pandemic may have limitations due to the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak, impacting the randomization of the sample.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of findings and inaccurate conclusions about mental health symptoms derived from the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Implement strict methodological protocols for sample randomization and consider the limitations of the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak during data interpretation.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software for robust data analysis and interpretation.","People":"Researchers, scientists, and mental health professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions and funding organizations."},{"Description":"Online surveys as the main method of information collection may trigger biases in participant selection, such as oversampling of certain demographics.","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of mental health symptoms and skewed research findings.","Mitigation":"Use stratified sampling and diverse recruitment strategies to address biases in participant selection. Consider alternative data collection methods.","Technologies":"Data collection platforms with built-in randomization features.","People":"Research analysts, survey administrators, and data collection teams.","Owner":"Research institutions and survey administration organizations."},{"Description":"Exclusion of specific populations in review studies may lead to the oversight of key findings related to vulnerable and underrepresented communities.","Impact":"Missed insights into the mental health impact on specific populations affected by the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Include targeted studies on specific populations and ensure diverse representation in research samples.","Technologies":"Diverse communication and outreach methods to engage underrepresented communities in research participation.","People":"Diverse community leaders, mental health advocates, and researchers.","Owner":"Research institutions and community outreach organizations."}]}
